        variable_1 : input_net_transition;
        variable_2 : normalized_voltage;
        index_1 ( "0.0110000, 0.0520000, 0.1070000, 0.2170000, 0.4370000" );

    }

    type ( A_bus_5_to_0 ) {
        base_type : array ;
        data_type : bit ;
        bit_width : 6 ;
        bit_from : 5 ;
        bit_to : 0 ;
        downto : true ;
